text:
Danielle Marie Lewis (born 17 August 1992) is a New Zealand water polo player. She is a member of the New Zealand women's national water polo team. She played at the 2011 World Aquatics Championships and 2015 World Aquatics Championships.
She was educated at Diocesan School for Girls, Auckland. She played for the University of Hawaii's women's water polo team.

annotations.surface_form: New Zealand women's national water polo team
